title: Wordle has been acquired by The New York Times
content:
The spelling puzzle game Wordle has become a sensation over the past few months, with more and more people posting their scores and results to Twitter and other social networks each day. The game’s success has already resulted in countless clones, and now the original game will soon have a new owner. Josh Wardle, the

The post Wordle has been acquired by The New York Times appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Wordle, the hit puzzle game that you've probably seen mentioned on Twitter, is now owned by The New York Times.
